verses.name: Proverbs 12:22
verses.text: Lying lips are abomination to the Lord: but they that deal truly are his delight.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:23
verses.text: A prudent man concealeth knowledge: but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:24
verses.text: The hand of the diligent shall bear rule: but the slothful shall be under tribute.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:25
verses.text: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:26
verses.text: The righteous is more excellent than his neighbour: but the way of the wicked seduceth them.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:27
verses.text: The slothful man roasteth not that which he took in hunting: but the substance of a diligent man is precious.
